trans-unit.source: Provides a mobile text writer adapter class for the WML device adapter set.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 在主控環境中運作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: The base writer object.
An object of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities" /> class that provides the capability information for the specific device.
The mobile page to write to.
Creates a new instance of the specified class.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET, and must have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 配接器通常由 ASP.NET，自動建構，而且必須具有預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the control containing the variable to initialize.
The value to which the variable is initialized when the browser renders the form.
<see langword="true" /> to encrypt the identifier for the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Adds a variable to be initialized when the browser renders the form.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
All references to the client identifier on the page are mapped, resulting in the same postback regardless of mapping.
trans-unit.target: 對應的用戶端識別碼，在頁面上的所有參考，導致相同的回傳，不論對應。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.AddFormVariable%2A> method also can scramble client IDs that must be encrypted for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.AddFormVariable%2A>方法也可以混淆基於安全性理由必須經過加密的用戶端識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Only visible controls generate variables.
trans-unit.target: 可見的控制項產生變數。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns whether the writer is in analyze mode.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
<see langword="true" /> if the writer is in analyze mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果寫入器是否處於，分析模式。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: WML rendering is done in two phases.
trans-unit.target: WML 轉譯是在兩個階段。

trans-unit.source: In the first phase, all calls to the renderer are analyzed for correctness.
trans-unit.target: 在第一個階段中，產生器的所有呼叫都會經過都分析的正確性。

trans-unit.source: In the second phase, the rendering is performed.
trans-unit.target: 在第二個階段中，則執行呈現。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include in the post fields the information for all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler" /> interfaces in the form; <see langword="false" /> to include no <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler" /> information.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPostFieldType" />.
Analyzes a single postback.
Called internally by the writer and inherited classes.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Override or call this method when advanced extensibility is required while extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫或進階擴充性需要時延伸時呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter>類別。

trans-unit.source: Begins a custom markup section.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.BeginCustomMarkup%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.EndCustomMarkup%2A> methods allow a device adapter to create a section of custom markup elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.BeginCustomMarkup%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.EndCustomMarkup%2A>方法，可讓裝置配接器可建立自訂標記項目的區段。

trans-unit.source: The form to begin.
Begins the given form.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Use this method and the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.EndForm%2A> method when rendering a form.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.EndForm%2A>方法呈現表單時。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the current form submits to an external URL; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
<see langword="true" /> to encode the URL string; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Returns the calculated URL required to post the form to the server.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The calculated URL required to post the form to the server.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class (writer).
trans-unit.target: 在內部呼叫寫入器，而且會覆寫繼承類別 （寫入器）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the query string to add to the URL to post the form to the server.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The query string.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器，在內部呼叫，而且您可以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: Closes any currently open character formatting tags.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器，在內部呼叫，而且您可以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: Closes an open paragraph.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器，在內部呼叫，而且您可以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the form currently being rendered.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The form currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: 目前轉譯格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default character formatting used by the device.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The default character formatting used by the device.
trans-unit.target: 裝置使用的預設字元格式。

trans-unit.source: Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by inheriting classes.
trans-unit.target: 在內部呼叫寫入器，而且可以加以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default layout used by the device.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The default layout used by the device.
trans-unit.target: 使用裝置的預設配置。

trans-unit.source: Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by inheriting classes.
trans-unit.target: 在內部呼叫寫入器，而且可以加以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: Ends a custom markup section.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.BeginCustomMarkup%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.EndCustomMarkup%2A> methods allow a device adapter to create a section of custom markup elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.BeginCustomMarkup%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.EndCustomMarkup%2A>方法，可讓裝置配接器可建立自訂標記項目的區段。

trans-unit.source: Ends the current form.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.BeginForm%2A> method and this method when rendering a form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.BeginForm%2A>方法，並呈現表單時，這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that character formatting tags corresponding to the current format have been written.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器，在內部呼叫，而且您可以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that a <see langword="< p >" /> tag corresponding to the current layout has been written.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器，在內部呼叫，而且您可以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: The specified style to use for formatting characters
Begins a block by using the character formatting from a specified style.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The style reference.
Begins a block by using the formatting from a given style.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The specified style to use for formatting characters.
Ends a block that has been using the character formatting from a specified style.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The style reference.
If <c>breakAfter</c> is true, a break is added after the closing style element.
The first form of the method assumes <c>breakAfter</c> to be <see langword="true" />.
Ends a block by using the formatting from a given style.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The label to validate.
Returns whether the given string is a valid softkey label for the target device.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
<see langword="true" /> if the given string is a valid softkey label for the target device; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Adapters can use this method to determine whether a label is appropriate for a softkey.
trans-unit.target: 配接器可以使用這個方法，來決定標籤是否適合使用螢幕鍵盤。

trans-unit.source: The client ID of a control to map.
Determines whether the client ID is encrypted.
Maps the client ID of a control to a short name to be used in rendering on the form.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
A string representation of the client identifier of the control.
If the client identifier of a control is longer than 16 characters, ASP.NET substitutes a uniquely mapped short name.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項的用戶端識別碼是超過 16 個字元，ASP.NET 會替代唯一對應的簡短名稱。

trans-unit.source: All references to the client identifier on the page are mapped, resulting in the same postback regardless of mapping.
trans-unit.target: 對應的用戶端識別碼，在頁面上的所有參考，導致相同的回傳，不論對應。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.MapClientIDToShortName%2A> can also scramble client IDs that must be encrypted for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.MapClientIDToShortName%2A> 其也加密用戶端 Id，基於安全性理由必須加密。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of softkeys supported on the device.
The default value is 0.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The number of softkeys supported on the device.
trans-unit.target: 在裝置上支援的螢幕按鍵數。

trans-unit.source: Softkeys are special keys that the application can usually map to custom tasks.
trans-unit.target: 螢幕按鍵的一些應用程式通常可以對應到自訂工作的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Softkey text is displayed on the screen in the lower-left and lower-right corners.
trans-unit.target: 在畫面的左下角和右下角會顯示螢幕鍵盤的文字。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value representing the WML format to use while writing.
Whether to open bold character formatting.
Whether to open italic character formatting.
Whether to open character size formatting.
Opens character formatting tags for the given format.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器，在內部呼叫，而且您可以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value representing the layout to use when opening a paragraph.
Whether to open paragraph alignment formatting.
Whether to open paragraph wrapping formatting.
Opens a paragraph with the given layout.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器，在內部呼叫，而且您可以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the page associated with the device adapter.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The page associated with the device adapter.
trans-unit.target: 與裝置配接器相關聯的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to calling the `Control.MobilePage`.
trans-unit.target: 相當於呼叫`Control.MobilePage`。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see langword="< br >" /> tag needs to be sent to the output stream.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see langword="< br >" /> tag needs to be sent to the output stream; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see langword="< br >" />標記必須傳送至輸出資料流; 否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: Analyzes a form after it is completed during the analyze phase.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器，在內部呼叫，而且您可以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: The form to begin rendering.
Renders the beginning of a form.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器，在內部呼叫，而且您可以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: The URL target.
Set to <see langword="true" /> if the URL is encoded.
The softkey text to use for the link if the <c>mapToSoftKey</c> parameter is set to <see langword="true" />.

Set to <see langword="true" /> if the softkey label comes from the adapter itself (the default label, or something else that is adapter-specified, such as "Call" for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.PhoneCall" /> control, rather than a softkey label explicitly specified by the application author).
Set to <see langword="true" /> if mapping to a softkey on the device.
Begins rendering a hyperlink element.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

This call can be followed by calls to render text or by a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.RenderImage%2A> method to render the hyperlink contents, followed by a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.RenderEndHyperlink%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此呼叫後面都可以接著呼叫來呈現文字，或呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.RenderImage%2A>方法以呈現超連結內容中，後面接著呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.RenderEndHyperlink%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The softkey text to use for the link if the <c>mapToSoftKey</c> parameter is set to <see langword="true" />.
Set to <see langword="true" /> if the softkey label comes from the adapter itself, rather than being a softkey label explicitly specified by the application author.
Set to <see langword="true" /> if mapping to a softkey on the device.
Begins the rendering of a postback.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The name of the control.
The name that the browser must use to submit the selected index back to the server.
The initial value.
The <see langword="Title" /> attribute on WML devices.
Whether to allow multiple selections.
Begins rendering a selection list.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Either `name` or `iname` must be non-null.
trans-unit.target: 可能是`name`或`iname`必須為非 null。

trans-unit.source: This method can be followed by calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.RenderSelectOption%2A> method for each option, followed by a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.RenderEndSelect%2A> method to end the selection list.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法後面可以接著呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.RenderSelectOption%2A>方法針對每個選項，後面接著呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.RenderEndSelect%2A>方法來結束選取項目清單。

trans-unit.source: The type of action to render.
Maps to the type attribute of the <see langword="< do >" /> element.
Usually "accept" or "options".
The ID of the control targeted by the action.
When the user selects the action, a postback is generated, targeting the control specified by this ID.
The argument for the action.
The argument is included in the postback generated when the user selects the action.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPostFieldType" /> type used for <c>arg.</c>
The label associated with the action.
This usually appears as a softkey label on the device.
Whether to include all variables on the form when posting back to the server.
Renders a <see langword="< do >" /> event.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

If the control you are targeting is the current form and you want to include all the variables when posting back to the server, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.RenderFormDoEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的目標控制項的目前表單，以及您想要包含所有的變數時張貼回傳至伺服器，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.RenderFormDoEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Called internally by the writer and inherited classes.
trans-unit.target: 在內部由寫入器及繼承類別呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Completes rendering of a form.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器，在內部呼叫，而且您可以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="true" /> if a break is required after the link.
Completes the rendering of a hyperlink element.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Contains the target URL of the postback.
Contains the argument associated with the target URL.
Specifies the type of postback.
Must be a value from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPostFieldType" /> enumeration.
Contains a Boolean value indicating whether postback variables should be calculated.
Contains <see langword="true" /> if a line break should follow the control.
Contains <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
Completes the rendering of a postback.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Indicates whether a break must follow the selection list.
Completes rendering a selection list.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Renders any extra cards that the writer needs to send to the browser.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Depending on the content of the form, the writer might need to send additional cards to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 根據表單的內容，寫入器可能需要其他的卡片傳送至瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: Called by the form adapter.
trans-unit.target: 由表單配接器呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The type of action to render.
Maps to the type attribute of the <do> element.
Usually "accept" or "options".
The argument for the action.
The argument is included in the postback generated when the user selects the action.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPostFieldType" /> type used for <c>arg.</c>
The label associated with the action.
This usually appears as a softkey label on the device.
Renders a <see langword="< do >" /> event for the current form.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Called internally by the writer and inherited classes.
trans-unit.target: 在內部由寫入器及繼承類別呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the control targeted by the action.
When the user selects the action, a postback is generated, targeting the control specified by this ID.
The argument for the action.
The argument is included in the postback generated when the user selects the action.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPostFieldType" /> type used for <c>arg.</c>
Whether to include all variables on the form when posting back to the server.
Renders a <see langword="< go >" /> action.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Called internally by the writer or inherited classes.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器會在內部呼叫，或繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the image URL.
Specifies an optional local image name.
Specifies text to display if the image cannot be displayed.
Set to <see langword="true" /> if a break is required after the image.
Renders an image element.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Renders a single option within a selection list.
The option text.
Renders a single option within a selection list.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The option text.
(Optional.) The option value.
Renders a single option within a selection list.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Renders a text element.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The text string to be rendered.
Renders a text element.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The text string to be rendered.
Specifies whether a break must follow the element.
Renders a text element.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The text string to be rendered.
Specifies whether a break must follow the element.
Specifies whether the text must be encoded.
Renders a text element.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Identifies the control.
Specifies the initial value of the text box.
Specifies an optional WML format string.
Contains the title of the text box.
Specifies the password.
Sets the size of the string.
Specifies the maximum length of the string.
Determines whether the identifier for the control (ID) is encrypted.
Set to <see langword="true" /> if a break is required after the control is rendered.
Renders a text-box element.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
This method can also scramble client IDs that must be encrypted for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也可以弄亂基於安全性理由必須經過加密的用戶端識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Resets the character formatting.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
This method closes all character formatting tags, such as `< b >`, that have been opened.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會關閉所有的字元格式化標記，例如`< b >`，已經開啟。

trans-unit.source: Whether to include any variables in the additional card.
Whether the writer must use an additional card for postbacks.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
<see langword="true" /> if the writer must use an additional card for postbacks; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Called internally by the writer, and can be overridden by an inheriting class.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器，在內部呼叫，而且您可以覆寫繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: The markup attribute to write to the output stream.
The value assigned to the attribute.
<see langword="true" /> to encode the attribute and its assigned value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Writes the specified markup attribute and value to the output stream, and, if specified, writes the value encoded.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Writes a line break.
The text string to encode and write to the output stream.
Encodes the specified text for the requesting device, and then writes it to the output stream.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The URL string to encode and write to the output stream.
Encodes the specified URL, and then writes it to the output stream.
The URL might include parameters.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Writes a <see langword="&lt; postfield &gt;" /> element, treating the value as specified by the <paramref name="type" /> parameter.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The field name.
The post field value.
Writes a <see langword="< postfield >" /> element, using the provided parameters.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
There is an assumed `type` parameter that defaults to <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPostFieldType.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有假設`type`參數，預設值為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPostFieldType.Normal>。

trans-unit.source: The field name.
The post field value.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPostFieldType" />.
Writes a < <see langword="postfield" /> > element, treating the value as specified by the <paramref name="type" /> parameter.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The field name.
The variable name to write.
Writes a post field, treating the <paramref name="arg" /> parameter as a variable name.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
You can use the short form as follows: `WritePostField(name, value, WmlPostFieldType.Normal)`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用如下的簡短形式： `WritePostField(name, value, WmlPostFieldType.Normal)`。

trans-unit.source: The text to write.
If <see langword="true" />, encodes the text.
Writes the given text, encoding it if desired.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Encoding involves mapping characters with HTML/WML meanings to the appropriate character code.
trans-unit.target: 編碼涉及對應至適當的字元程式碼的 HTML/WML 意義的字元。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to encode.
The value of the attribute to encode.
Writes the given attribute, encoding the value by using WML text encoding.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
Encoding involves mapping characters with HTML/WML meanings to the appropriate character code.
trans-unit.target: 編碼涉及對應至適當的字元程式碼的 HTML/WML 意義的字元。
